00023 /*************************************************************************************
00024 
00025 runFunctions.h is for general coding. Specifically, functions in this header files
00026 implements
00027       Obtaining Final Layered Layouts For
00028           Main Centered Graphs(RUN_SELF2 and RUN_AGAIN2 to draw the graph )
00029           Peripheral Graphs(RUN_SELF and RUN_AGAIN to draw the peripheral graphs )
00030       Obtaining Force Directed Layout(RUN_FFD)
00031       
00032 
00033 Created
00034 
00035 01 January 2009
00036 
00037 *************************************************************************************/
00038

00048 /* Function is based for Weighted Layered Drawing, 
00049 proposed in ISB'10. Each step considers weight.
00050 Inputs are straightforward, for the ISB paper,
00051 this procedure calculates the peripheral graphs.
00052 Note that for x-coordinate case we are
00053 using python codes embeded into this procedure's
00054 sub-functions */
00055 GRAPH<int,int> RUN_SELF(  GRAPH<int,int> &G, 
00056                           array<list<node> > &layers, 
00057                           int W, 
00058                           node_array<double> &Xpos, 
00059                           node_array<double> &Ypos, 
00060                           int graphNo, 
00061                           node_array<point> &posx,
00062                           edge_array<list<point> > &bendsx, 
00063                           int algorithmFlag, 
00064                           int space, 
00065                           bool xCoordFlag, 
00066                           int increment,
00067                           bool ledaPostFlag 
00068 ){

00077 //*********************//
00078 // Give rank assignmen //
00079 //*********************//
00080         forall_edges( e, G )
00081         {
00082                         if( G.source( e ) == G.target( e ) )
00083                                         G.del_edge( e );
00084         }
00085         forall_edges( e, G )
00086         {
00087                         if( G.source( e ) == G.target( e ) )
00088                                         G.del_edge( e );
00089         }

00107         // Leda function to arrange Graph like removing parallel edges

00111         forall_nodes( n , G ){

00130 /*********************** ACYCLIC PHASE I ************************/

00144         // Catch the cycle and if you can you get the min weighted edge 
00145         // in cylce that removes the cycle when it is deleted.
00146         while( !acyclicBool ){
00147                         list_item it;
00148                         Is_Acyclic( G, cycleEdges );            
00149                                                         
00150                         forall_items( it, cycleEdges ){
00151                                         e = cycleEdges[ it ];
00152                                         node_array<bool> nvisit( G, false );
00153                                         edge_array<bool> eonPath( G, false );
00154                                         cycleFinder = cycleCatcher( G, e, G.source( e ), G.target( e ), eonPath, nvisit );
00155                         
00156                                         #ifdef DEBUG    
00157                                                         cycleFinder.print();
00158                                         #endif
00159 
00160                                                 int max = 0;
00161                                                 edge etemp;
00162                                                 forall_items( it, cycleEdges ){
00163                                                                 e = cycleEdges[ it ];
00164                                                                 if( max <= H[ e ] ){
00165                                                                                 max = H[ e ];
00166                                                                 }
00167                                                 }
00168                                                 int min = max;
00169 
00170                                                 forall_items( it, cycleFinder ){
00171                                                                 e = cycleFinder[ it ];
00172                                                                 if( min >= H[ e ] ){
00173                                                                                 min = H[ e ];
00174                                                                                 etemp = e;
00175                                                                 }
00176                                                                 #ifdef DEBUG
00177                                                                                 cout << H[ e ] << " - ";
00178                                                                 #endif
00179 
00180                                                 }
00181                                                 int c = 0;
00182                                                 forall_items( it, cycleFinder ){
00183                                                                 e = cycleFinder[ it ];
00184                                                                 H[ e ] -= min; 
00185                                                                 if( H[ e ] == 0 && inList( suspis , e ) == false ){
00186                                                                                 c = 1;
00187                                                                                 suspis += e;
00188                                                                                 G.hide_edge( e );
00189                                                                 }
00190 
00191                                                                 #ifdef DEBUG
00192                                                                                 cout << endl << " suspis - > ";
00193                                                                                 suspis.print();
00194                                                                                 cout << endl;
00195                                                                 #endif
00196 
00197                                                 }
00198                                                 
00199                         }
00200                         #ifdef DEBUG
00201                                         drawCycleEdges( G, visited, dfsEList, suspis );
00202                         #endif
00203                         cycleEdges.clear();
00204                         acyclicBool = TOPSORTG(G,ord);
00205         }
00206 
00207 /****************************************************************/
00208 /*********************** ACYCLIC PHASE II ***********************/
00209 /****************************************************************/
00210 
00211 //-> Restore All edges give the original value to suspicious edges
00212             G.restore_all_edges();
00213                 forall_edges( e, G ){
00214                                 G[ e ] = prevEdgeList[ e ];

00232                                                 e = suspis.pop();
00233                                                 if( max <= G[ e ] ){
00234                                                                 max = G[ e ];
00235                                                                 etemp = e;
00236                                                                 etempChanged = 1;
00237                                                 }

00239                                 }

00241                                                 e = popedList[ it ];
00242                                                 if( e == etemp )
00243                                                                 ;
00244                                                 else
00245                                                         suspis.append( e );
00246                                 }
00247                                 if( etempChanged == 1  ){
00248                                         G.restore_edge( etemp );
00249                                         etemp = G.rev_edge( etemp );
00250                                         reversedEdges.append( etemp );
00251                                 }
00252                                 if( Is_Acyclic( G ) != true ){
00253                                                 etemp = G.rev_edge( etemp );
00254                                                 forall_items( it, reversedEdges ){
00255                                                             e = popedList[ it ];
00256                                                                 if( e == etemp )
00257                                                                         reversedEdges.del_item( it );
00258                                                 }
00259                                 }
00260                                 if( suspis.empty() == false )
00261                                                 goto END;
00262                                 
00263 #ifdef DEBUG
00264                 cout << endl << "suspis";
00265                 suspis.print();
00266                 cout << endl;
00267 #endif
00268         
00269         G.restore_all_edges();
00270         cycleEdges.clear();
00271         array<list<node> > sourceAndTargets( reversedEdges.size() );
00272         
00273         random_walk = 0;
00274         forall_items( it, reversedEdges ){
00275                 sourceAndTargets[ random_walk ].push_back( G.source( reversedEdges[ it ] ) );
00276                 sourceAndTargets[ random_walk ].push_back( G.target( reversedEdges[ it ] ) );
00277                 random_walk++;
00278         }

00346 /******************** ADD DUMMY VERTICES ************************/
00347                 node target,source;
00348                 edge_array<bool> eMarked( G, false );
00349                 list<edge> allEdges;
00350                 list<node> dummyNodes;
00351 
00352                 allEdges = G.all_edges();
00353                 forall_items( it, allEdges ){
00354                                 e = allEdges[ it ];
00355                                 if( ( max - ready[ G.source( e ) ] ) - 1 > ( max - ready[ G.target( e ) ] ) && eMarked[ e ] == false ){
00356                                                 
00357                                                 int sourceLayer = max - ready[ G.source( e ) ];
00358                                                 int targetLayer = max - ready[ G.target( e ) ];
00359                                                 target = G.source( e );
00360                                                 source = G.target( e );
00361 
00362                                                 int etempx = G[ e ];
00363                                                 G.del_edge( e );
00364                                                 
00365                                                 int x = 0;
00366                                                 while( sourceLayer - 1 != targetLayer ){
00367                                                                 n = G.new_node();
00368                                                                 dummyNodes.append( n );
00369                                                                 e = G.new_edge( target, n );
00370                                                                 if( x % 2 == 0 )
00371                                                                         Layers[ sourceLayer - 1 ].push_back( n );
00372                                                                 else
00373                                                                         Layers[ sourceLayer - 1 ].push_front( n );
00374 
00375                                                                 sourceLayer--;
00376                                                                 G[ e ] = etempx;
00377                                                                 eMarked.init( G );
00378                                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;
00379                                                                 target = n;
00380                                                                 x++;
00381                                                 }
00382                                                 e = G.new_edge( n, source );
00383                                                 G[ e ] = etempx;
00384                                                 eMarked.init( G );
00385                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;
00386                                 }
00387                                 else{
00388                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;
00389                                 }
00390                 }
00391

00673 /* Function is based for Force Directed Layout 
00674 Inputs are straightforward, this procedure 
00675 calculates the peripheral graphs */
00676 GRAPH<int,int> RUN_FFD(  GRAPH<int,int> &G, 
00677                           array<list<node> > &layers, 
00678                           int W, 
00679                           node_array<double> &Xpos, 
00680                           node_array<double> &Ypos, 
00681                           int graphNo, 
00682                           node_array<point> &posx,
00683                           edge_array<list<point> > &bendsx, 
00684                           int algorithmFlag, 
00685                           int space, 
00686                           bool xCoordFlag, 
00687                           int increment,
00688                           bool ledaPostFlag 
00689 ){      
00690         edge e;
00691         node n;
00692         int random_walk;
00693         node_array<double> xpos( G, 0 );
00694         node_array<double> ypos( G, 0 );
00695 //*********************//
00696 // Give rank assignmen //
00697 //*********************//
00698         forall_edges( e, G )
00699         {
00700                         if( G.source( e ) == G.target( e ) )
00701                                         G.del_edge( e );
00702         }
00703         forall_edges( e, G )
00704         {
00705                         if( G.source( e ) == G.target( e ) )
00706                                         G.del_edge( e );
00707         }
00708         node_array<int> nodeid( G, 3 );
00709         SPRING_EMBEDDING_( G, xpos, ypos, 100, nodeid );
00710         Xpos = xpos;
00711         Ypos = ypos;
00712         return G;
00713 }
00714 
00715 /* Function is specialized to form main layout,
00716 it performs again weighted layout over the 
00717 collected graph edges according to criteria
00718 shown in ISB paper */
00719 GRAPH<int,int> RUN_SELF2( GRAPH<int,int> &G, 
00720                           int max_height, 
00721                           int W, 
00722                           node_array<double> &Xpos,
00723                           node_array<double> &Ypos, 
00724                           int graphNo, 
00725                           node_array<point> &posx,
00726                           edge_array<list<point> > &bendsx, 
00727                           node_array<double> &Hvalues,
00728                           list<node> &hided, 
00729                           int algorithmFlag,
00730                           bool brandFlag,
00731                           bool brandFlag2,
00732                           bool ourMethodFlag,
00733                           double space,
00734                           int increment,
00735                           bool ledaPostFlag,
00736                           double nodeSize,
00737                           double edgeBendImp,
00738                           double colorScale,
00739                           double edgThicknessTher
00740  ){
00741 
00742         GRAPH<int,int> H;
00743 
00744         edge e;
00745         node n;
00746         //random_graph( G, noden, edgen );
00747         random_source S(1,max_height);
00748         int random_walk;
00749 
00750 //*********************//
00751 // Give rank assignmen //
00752 //*********************//
00753         forall_edges( e, G )
00754         {
00755                         if( G.source( e ) == G.target( e ) )
00756                                         G.del_edge( e );
00757         }
00758         forall_edges( e, G )
00759         {
00760                         if( G.source( e ) == G.target( e ) )
00761                                         G.del_edge( e );
00762         }
00763 
00764         list<edge> edgelist;
00765         list_item it,it2;
00766         node_array<bool> marked(G,false);
00767 
00768 /*
00769         forall_edges( e1 ,G ){
00770                 forall_edges( e2, G ){
00771                         if( G.target( e1 ) == G.target( e2 ) && G.source( e1 ) == G.source( e2 ) && e1 != e2 ){
00772                                         cout << " " << G[ e1 ] << " - " << G[ e2 ] << endl;
00773                                         G.del_edge( e2 );
00774                         }
00775                 }
00776         }
00777 */
00778         
00779         list<edge> paralells;
00780         // Leda function to arrange Graph like removing parallel edges
00781         paralells = Make_Simple( G );
00782         G.del_edges( paralells );
00783         list<node> A;
00784         forall_nodes( n , G ){
00785                         A.append( n );
00786         }
00787 
00788         node root;
00789         forall_nodes( n , G ){
00790                         root = n;
00791                         break;
00792         }
00793 
00794         list<edge> feedback;
00795         node_array<bool> visited( G, false );
00796         list<edge> dfsEList;

00799 
00800         dfs( root, G, visited, A, dfsEList );
00801 
00802 /****************************************************************/
00803 /*********************** ACYCLIC PHASE I ************************/
00804 /****************************************************************/
00805 
00806         node_array<int> ord(G);
00807         bool acyclicBool = TOPSORTG(G,ord);
00808         list<edge> cycleFinder;
00809         list<edge> reversedEdges;
00810         H = G;
00811 
00812         edge_array<int> prevEdgeList( G, 0 );
00813         forall_edges( e, G ){
00814                         prevEdgeList[ e ] = G[ e ];
00815         }
00816 
00817         // Catch the cycle and if you can you get the min weighted edge 
00818         // in cylce that removes the cycle when it is deleted.
00819         while( !acyclicBool ){
00820                         list_item it;
00821                         Is_Acyclic( G, cycleEdges );            
00822                                                         
00823                         forall_items( it, cycleEdges ){
00824                                         e = cycleEdges[ it ];
00825                                         node_array<bool> nvisit( G, false );
00826                                         edge_array<bool> eonPath( G, false );
00827                                         cycleFinder = cycleCatcher( G, e, G.source( e ), G.target( e ), eonPath, nvisit );
00828                         
00829                                         #ifdef DEBUG    
00830                                                         cycleFinder.print();
00831                                         #endif
00832 
00833                                                 int max = 0;
00834                                                 edge etemp;
00835                                                 forall_items( it, cycleEdges ){
00836                                                                 e = cycleEdges[ it ];
00837                                                                 if( max <= H[ e ] ){
00838                                                                                 max = H[ e ];
00839                                                                 }
00840                                                 }
00841                                                 int min = max;
00842 
00843                                                 forall_items( it, cycleFinder ){
00844                                                                 e = cycleFinder[ it ];
00845                                                                 if( min >= H[ e ] ){
00846                                                                                 min = H[ e ];
00847                                                                                 etemp = e;
00848                                                                 }
00849                                                                 #ifdef DEBUG
00850                                                                                 cout << H[ e ] << " - ";
00851                                                                 #endif
00852 
00853                                                 }
00854                                                 int c = 0;
00855                                                 forall_items( it, cycleFinder ){
00856                                                                 e = cycleFinder[ it ];
00857                                                                 H[ e ] -= min; 
00858                                                                 if( H[ e ] == 0 && inList( suspis , e ) == false ){
00859                                                                                 c = 1;
00860                                                                                 suspis += e;
00861                                                                                 G.hide_edge( e );
00862                                                                 }
00863 
00864                                                                 #ifdef DEBUG
00865                                                                                 cout << endl << " suspis - > ";
00866                                                                                 suspis.print();
00867                                                                                 cout << endl;
00868                                                                 #endif
00869 
00870                                                 }
00871                                                 
00872                         }
00873                         #ifdef DEBUG
00874                                         drawCycleEdges( G, visited, dfsEList, suspis );
00875                         #endif
00876                         cycleEdges.clear();
00877                         acyclicBool = TOPSORTG(G,ord);
00878         }
00879 
00880 /****************************************************************/
00881 /*********************** ACYCLIC PHASE II ***********************/
00882 /****************************************************************/
00883 
00884 //-> Restore All edges give the original value to suspicious edges
00885             G.restore_all_edges();
00886                 forall_edges( e, G ){
00887                                 G[ e ] = prevEdgeList[ e ];
00888                 }
00889                 edge etemp;
00890 //-> Hide again to test that suspis are realy suspicious ones
00891                 G.hide_edges( suspis );
00892 
00893 
00894 #ifdef DEBUG
00895                 suspis.print();
00896 #endif
00897 
00898                 list<edge> popedList;
00899 
00900                 END:
00901                                 int max = 0;
00902                                 popedList.clear();
00903                                 int etempChanged = 0;
00904                                 while( !(suspis.empty()) ){
00905                                                 e = suspis.pop();
00906                                                 if( max <= G[ e ] ){
00907                                                                 max = G[ e ];
00908                                                                 etemp = e;
00909                                                                 etempChanged = 1;
00910                                                 }
00911                                                 popedList.append( e );
00912                                 }
00913                                 forall_items(it,popedList ){
00914                                                 e = popedList[ it ];
00915                                                 if( e == etemp )
00916                                                                 ;
00917                                                 else
00918                                                         suspis.append( e );
00919                                 }
00920                                 if( etempChanged == 1  ){
00921                                         G.restore_edge( etemp );
00922                                         etemp = G.rev_edge( etemp );
00923                                         reversedEdges.append( etemp );
00924                                 }
00925                                 if( Is_Acyclic( G ) != true ){
00926                                                 etemp = G.rev_edge( etemp );
00927                                                 forall_items( it, reversedEdges ){
00928                                                             e = popedList[ it ];
00929                                                                 if( e == etemp )
00930                                                                         reversedEdges.del_item( it );
00931                                                 }
00932                                 }
00933                                 if( suspis.empty() == false )
00934                                                 goto END;
00935                                 
00936 #ifdef DEBUG
00937                 cout << endl << "suspis";
00938                 suspis.print();
00939                 cout << endl;
00940 #endif
00941         
00942         G.restore_all_edges();
00943         cycleEdges.clear();
00944         array<list<node> > sourceAndTargets( reversedEdges.size() );
00945         
00946         random_walk = 0;
00947         forall_items( it, reversedEdges ){
00948                 sourceAndTargets[ random_walk ].push_back( G.source( reversedEdges[ it ] ) );
00949                 sourceAndTargets[ random_walk ].push_back( G.target( reversedEdges[ it ] ) );
00950                 random_walk++;
00951         }
00952 
00953 #ifdef DRAW
00954                 drawCycleEdges( G, visited, dfsEList, reversedEdges );
00955 #endif
00956 
00957 
00958 /*********************** END OF ACYLIC **************************/
00959 /****************************************************************/
00960                 
00961 cout << "\n Acyclic Done \n" ;

00969

00975                 //drawCycleEdges( G, visited, dfsEList, suspis );
00976         
00977         /****** End of Transitive Edges Removal *******/
00978         /****** Coffman Graham Ranking Phase 1 ********/

00983         /****** Coffman Graham Ranking Phase 1 End ****/

00995                                         max = ready[ n ];
00996                 }

00999                 array<list<node> > LayersTemp( max + 1 );
01000

01003                 }

01025                 forall_items( it, allEdges ){
01026                                 e = allEdges[ it ];
01027                                 if( ( max - ready[ G.source( e ) ] ) - 1 > ( max - ready[ G.target( e ) ] ) && eMarked[ e ] == false ){
01028                                                 
01029                                                 int sourceLayer = max - ready[ G.source( e ) ];
01030                                                 int targetLayer = max - ready[ G.target( e ) ];
01031                                                 target = G.source( e );
01032                                                 source = G.target( e );
01033 
01034                                                 int etempx = G[ e ];
01035                                                 G.del_edge( e );
01036                                                 
01037                                                 int x = 0;
01038                                                 while( sourceLayer - 1 != targetLayer ){
01039                                                                 n = G.new_node();
01040                                                                 dummyNodes.append( n );
01041                                                                 e = G.new_edge( target, n );
01042                                                                 if( x % 2 == 0 )
01043                                                                         Layers[ sourceLayer - 1 ].push_back( n );
01044                                                                 else
01045                                                                         Layers[ sourceLayer - 1 ].push_front( n );
01046 
01047                                                                 sourceLayer--;
01048                                                                 G[ e ] = etempx;
01049                                                                 eMarked.init( G );
01050                                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;
01051                                                                 target = n;
01052                                                                 x++;
01053                                                 }
01054                                                 e = G.new_edge( n, source );
01055                                                 G[ e ] = etempx;
01056                                                 eMarked.init( G );
01057                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;
01058                                 }
01059                                 else{
01060                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;
01061                                 }
01062                 }
01063 
01064 /******************** END OF ADDING DUMMY VERTICES **************/
01065 /****************************************************************/
01066

01155                 node_array<double> xpos(G);

01210                         forall_edges( e, G ){

01222                       tuples[ e ] = t_e;

01224

01273                                                 allEdges = G.out_edges( temp );

01275                                                 forall_items( it, allEdges ){
01276                                                                 e = allEdges[ it ];

01284                                                                 edgeValue = G[ e ];
01285                                                                 G.del_edge( e );
01286                                                 }

01288                                                                 temp = m;
01289                                                                 goto NEXTDUMMY;
01290                                                 }
01291                                                 else{
01292                                                                 target = m;
01293                                                 }
01294                                                 etemp = G.new_edge( source, target );

01304                                                 cout << endl << " Y : ";
01305                                                 edgePositionsY[ etemp ].print();
01306 #endif
01307                                                 tempPoints.clear();
01308                                 }

01310                 }
01311

01313 //              //runWithMenu( G );

01321                         }

01325                                 }
01326                         }
01327                 }

01331                 int i = 1;
01332                 forall_nodes( n, G ){
01333 //                  cout << G[ n ] << " ";
01334                     G[ n ]=i;
01335 
01336                     i++;
01337                 }
01338         
01339                 GraphWin gw2(G);
01340                 gw2.save_gml( "main_graph" );

01445         /****** Coffman Graham Ranking Phase 2 ********/

01456                                         max = ready[ n ];
01457                 }

01483                 forall_items( it, allEdges ){
01484                                 e = allEdges[ it ];
01485                                 if( ( max - ready[ G.source( e ) ] ) - 1 > ( max - ready[ G.target( e ) ] ) && eMarked[ e ] == false ){
01486                                                 
01487                                                 int sourceLayer = max - ready[ G.source( e ) ];
01488                                                 int targetLayer = max - ready[ G.target( e ) ];
01489                                                 target = G.source( e );
01490                                                 source = G.target( e );
01491 
01492                                                 int etempx = G[ e ];
01493                                                 G.del_edge( e );
01494                                                 
01495                                                 int x = 0;
01496                                                 while( sourceLayer - 1 != targetLayer ){
01497                                                                 n = G.new_node();
01498                                                                 dummyNodes.append( n );
01499                                                                 e = G.new_edge( target, n );
01500                                                                 if( x % 2 == 0 )
01501                                                                         Layers[ sourceLayer - 1 ].push_back( n );
01502                                                                 else
01503                                                                         Layers[ sourceLayer - 1 ].push_front( n );
01504 
01505                                                                 sourceLayer--;
01506                                                                 G[ e ] = etempx;
01507                                                                 eMarked.init( G );
01508                                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;
01509                                                                 target = n;
01510                                                                 x++;
01511                                                 }
01512                                                 e = G.new_edge( n, source );
01513                                                 G[ e ] = etempx;
01514                                                 eMarked.init( G );

01516                                 }
01517                                 else{
01518                                                 eMarked[ e ] = true;

01817 void RUN_AGAIN2(  GRAPH<int,int> G, 
01818                   int W, 
01819                   node_array<double> &Xpos,
01820                   node_array<double> &Ypos, 
01821                   char filename[ 1024 ], 
01822                   int graphNo, 
01823                   list<list<struct Strings> > namesForEachGraph, 
01824                   node_array<point> pos ,
01825                   edge_array<list<point> > bends, 
01826                   char abbv[], 
01827                   array<char> &Categories,
01828                   double edgeBendImp, 
01829                   double colorScale, 
01830                   double edgThicknessTher
01831  ){
01832 
01833                 node n;
01834                 GraphWin gw2(G,300,300);        
01835 
01836                 list<struct Strings> nodeNames;
01837                 //list<list<Strings>> namesForEachGraph
01838                 int counter = 0;
01839                 list_item it;
01840                 forall_items( it, namesForEachGraph ){
01841                         nodeNames = namesForEachGraph[ it ];
01842                         if( counter == graphNo )
01843                                 break;
01844                         counter++;
01845                 }
01846                 
01847                 gw2.set_edge_thickness( 3, true );
01848                 forall_nodes( n, G ){
01849                         for( int i = 0; i < 13; i++ ){
01850                                 if( Categories[ G[ n ] ] == abbv[ i ] ){
01851                                         leda::color x( i + 1 );
01852                                         gw2.set_border_color( n,x );
01853                                 }
01854                         }
01855                         gw2.set_color( n, red );
01856                 }
01857                 edge e;
01858                 array<color> color_l( 5 );
01859 
01860                 list<int> weights;
01861                 forall_edges( e, G ){
01862 
01863                 }
01864                 list<two_tuple<color,int> > variations;
01865                 list<int> edgeWeights;
01866 
01867                 forall_edges( e, G ){
01868                         int flag = 0;
01869                         forall_items( it, edgeWeights ){
01870                                 if( edgeWeights[ it ] == G[ e ] ){
01871                                         flag = 1;
01872                                         break;
01873                                 }
01874                         }
01875                         if( flag == 0 ){
01876                                 edgeWeights.push_back( G[ e ] );
01877                         }
01878                 }
01879                 edgeWeights.sort();
01880                 int tm_c = (double)(220.0 / (double)edgeWeights.size() );
01881                 int count = 20 + edgeWeights.size() * tm_c;
01882                 for( int j = 0; j < color_l.size(); j++ ){
01883                         color el( count, count, count );
01884                         color_l[ j ] = el;
01885                         count -= tm_c;
01886                 }               
01887                 count = 0;
01888                 for( int x = edgeWeights[edgeWeights.first()]; x <= edgeWeights[edgeWeights.last()]; x++ ){     
01889                         for( int j = 0; j < color_l.size(); j++ ){
01890                                 two_tuple<color,int> Tp( color_l[ j ], x );
01891 //                              cout << Tp << endl;
01892                                 variations.push_back( Tp );
01893                         }
01894                         count++;
01895                 }
01896                 int increase = (int) ((double)variations.size() / (double)edgeWeights.size());
01897 //              cout << " increase : " << increase << endl;
01898                 forall_edges( e, G ){              
01899                         count = 0;
01900                         forall_items( it, edgeWeights ){
01901                               if( edgeWeights[ it ] == G[ e ] ){
01902                                     break;
01903                               }
01904                               count++;
01905                         }
01906                         two_tuple<color,int> Tp = variations[ variations.get_item( increase / edgThicknessTher * count ) ] ;
01907                         gw2.set_thickness( e, Tp.second() / edgThicknessTher * 5.0 );
01908                         gw2.set_color( e, Tp.first() );
01909 //                      cout << Tp << endl;
01910                 }
01911 
01912                 gw2.set_node_height(50,true);
01913 //              gw2.set_node_border_color( red, true );
01914                 gw2.set_node_border_thickness( 3, true );
01915                 gw2.set_node_width( 100, true );
01916                 gw2.set_node_shape( leda::ovalrect_node, true );
01917                 gw2.set_edge_label_type(leda::data_label , true);
01918                 gw2.set_edge_label_font(leda::roman_font, 10);
01919                 gw2.set_edge_shape( leda::poly_edge, true );
01920                 node s;
01921                 it = nodeNames.first_item();
01922                 struct Strings temp_str;
01923                 forall_nodes( s, G ){
01924                         temp_str = nodeNames[ it ];
01925                         gw2.set_label(s,temp_str.name);
01926                         it = nodeNames.succ( it );
01927                 }
01928 
01929                 gw2.set_layout( pos, bends );
01930 //              gw2.set_edge_shape( leda::bezier_edge, true );
01931                 
01932                 gw2.set_animation_steps(5);
01933 
01934                 gw2.display();
01935                 gw2.save_gml(filename);
01936                 gw2.zoom_graph();
01937                 gw2.edit();
01938 }
